long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the Islamic Prayer Times & Location-Based Reminders Chrome Extension! This extension is designed to help you keep track of your daily prayers with precision and convenience. Whether youâ€™re at home, at work, or on the go, this extension ensures you never miss a prayer.

Features:
- Automatic Location Detection: The extension uses your current location to automatically calculate prayer times for Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha.
Accurate Prayer Times: Get reliable prayer times based on your geographic location, ensuring that you have the correct times for your area.
- Current Prayer Highlight: See at a glance which prayer is currently being performed and what the next prayer time is.
- User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an easy-to-use and intuitive interface that allows you to navigate the app with ease.

How It Works:
- Automatic Location Detection: The extension automatically detects your location using the Geocoding API to provide accurate prayer times based on your coordinates.
Prayer Time Calculation: The extension calculates prayer times using reliable data sources to ensure accuracy.
- Prayer Time Display: View the times for all five daily prayers along with the current prayer being highlighted.

Benefits:
- Accuracy: The extension provides precise prayer times using dependable APIs, so you can rely on it for your daily prayers.
- Convenience: No need to manually input your location; the extension does it all for you.
